thread.title: 1 dead, 3 injured in factory blasts in south-eastern Spain
thread.title_full: 1 dead, 3 injured in factory blasts in south-eastern Spain | News24

author: news24.com
title: 1 dead, 3 injured in factory blasts in south-eastern Spain
text:
Madrid - Spanish officials say one person has died and at least three others are seriously injured after two explosions at a chemical and fuel factory outside the south-eastern town of Almeria.
A police spokesperson said the blasts happened on Monday in the PITA industrial complex 30km outside the city. The city's interior ministry office said one worker died and three were injured.
The spokesperson said fire-fighters were searching the area for others who could possibly be injured. She spoke on condition of anonymity because of police rules preventing her from being named.
